awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 3 wins & 1 nomination.

fullplot: This is a dramatization of events in the life of St. Francis of Assisi from before his conversion experience through his audience with the pope, including his friendship with St. Clare.
plot: This is a dramatization of events in the life of St. Francis of Assisi from before his conversion experience through his audience with the pope, including his friendship with St. Clare.
title: Brother Sun, Sister Moon
